column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday December 22 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: UPDATE - I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: At midnight on Monday 12/21, I-75N will be CLOSED to ALL traffic starting at the I-275 interchange in preparation for the reopening of the bridge.

column3: UPDATE - I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Please see complete details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
